Text: Hydro QuebecTana I know that you are expecting to get back to me next Wednesday but our traders faced credit issues with Enron today and they asked me to push forward the process of getting all agreements in place as soon as Thus I am sending you a draft of a restated and amended guaranty agreement hoping that this will help to speed up the process I will call you on Monday pmiMdoc HlSne Cossette ConseillSre Contrats Commerciaux A Ren Lvesque Boulevard West th floor Montral Qubec HZ A pmiMdoc
